name: Ratings
description: Professional rating system for Jellyfin. Rate media with 1-10 stars, view detailed user ratings on hover, and see rating badges on media cards. Optimized for large libraries with lazy loading.
overview: Comprehensive rating plugin with star-based UI, average ratings display, detailed user rating popups, and performance-optimized card overlays for large media libraries.

versions.changelog: Fixed plugin not loading during navigation. Added hashchange and popstate event listeners for reliable SPA routing detection. Plugin now loads correctly when navigating between media items without manual refresh.
